comments.author: Ning Gu
comments.content: Tab text in the bottom will be replaced by icon and text (in vertical layout). Hightlight color for icon would be filled red as in Event Cinema's logo. Normal color would be unfilled and grey.

comments.author: Ning Gu
comments.content: Since more content will be added into screen, the Event Cinema's logo is hidden behind the window to provide more space. Whenever user scrolls the window down, it would show up in top. This feature should be applied to each design page.

comments.author: Ning Gu
comments.content:
Since more content will be added into screen, the Event Cinema's logo is hidden behind the window to provide more space. Whenever user scrolls the window down, it would show up in top. This feature should be applied to each design page.

The logo is partically vialbe in this design to show its position, but it should be invisible in real implementation

comments.author: Ning Gu
comments.content: The Collection booking button is moved from top to the bottom position for easier reach. Also its border is removed to be compatable with iOS7 style.
